miniapp.name: BaseVault
miniapp.subtitle: Collaborative savings made easy
miniapp.description: BaseVault is a decentralized application on Base L2 that enables groups to create savings vaults, contribute ETH collaboratively, and vote democratically on fund releases. Perfect for group vacations, collective gifts, shared projects, and any collaborative financial goal.
miniapp.ogDescription: Create group savings vaults and vote democratically to release funds. Built on Base L2 for low fees and fast transactions.
